snippet.title: A Cozy Indie Game about Making a Pumpkin Patch | Hexagourds
snippet.description:
Hexagourds is is available now! Please visit the Steam page for Hexagourds: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1778490/Hexagourds

------
Hexagourds is a casual, relaxing tile placement game with unique builder and puzzle mechanics. In Hexagourds, you place tiles on a grid to make your own pumpkin patch! Grow pumpkins, feed animals, and pick apples as you gain points for rotating, placing and connecting different tiles. 

Please reach to me if you have feedback on the game, any questions, or if you have any issues with the game. I really hope you enjoy the game with your next cup of coffee.

Thank for listening.

David from Urodela Games
Twitter: https://twitter.com/urodelagames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/
